descriptionlist.description:
NOT COMPATIBLE WITH IPAD

Controls battery charging level

BattSafe allows you to controls at what percentage your battery should stop charging. Only compatible with iPhone running iOS 13+. Not compatible with iPad.

Features:
  • Stop charging at designated battery percentage

  • Override stopped charging from notification

  • Control center module for easy enabling/disabling

  • Activator extensions


If you wish to contribute in localizing in your local language, submit pull request at https://github.com/udevsharold/BattSafe-Localization

This package tested to be working on iOS 13.5. Might or might not work on other iOS version.



To support development: https://www.paypal.me/udevs
